mapper.sql: id, project_no_id, plan_name, project_no, add_plan, w_audit, is_quality, y_audit, update_num, upload_num, update_date, create_date,send_type
mapper.select: select ir.*,pt.initiator,pt.accepter,pt.task_type,pt.task_status,pt.operator,pt.meeting_no from inspection_plan_info ir INNER JOIN project_task pt on ir.project_no_id=pt.project_no_id where 1=1 and add_plan=1 and w_audit=1 and is_quality=0 AND send_type=0

select count(*) from inspection_plan_info ir INNER JOIN project_task pt on ir.project_no_id=pt.project_no_id where 1=1
AND ir.project_no like CONCAT('%', #{projectNo}, '%')
order by ir.create_date desc
mapper.insert:
insert into inspection_plan_info
id,
project_no_id,
plan_name,
project_no,
add_plan,
w_audit,
is_quality,
y_audit,
update_num,
upload_num,
update_date,
create_date,
send_type,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{projectNoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{wAudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{yAudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{uploadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{sendType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update inspection_plan_info
project_no_id = #{projectNoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_name = #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_no = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
add_plan = #{addPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
w_audit = #{wAudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_quality = #{isQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
y_audit = #{yAudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_num = #{updateNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
upload_num = #{uploadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
send_type = #{sendType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update inspection_plan_info set project_no_id = #{projectNoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_name = #{planName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_no = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_plan = #{addPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w_audit = #{wAudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_quality = #{isQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, y_audit = #{yAudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_num = #{updateNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upload_num = #{uploadNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
